translations: n.[外科]疝；突出（hernia 的复数）

sentences.sentence: Hernias tend to get larger with time.
sentences.translation: 疝气往往得到较大的随时间。

sentences.sentence: Ventral hernias do not go away on their own and may enlarge with time.
sentences.translation: 腹疝是不会自行消失(痊愈)的，并且可能随著时间的推移而变得更坏。

sentences.sentence: This can bring you back from losing your life or help to avoid hernias after coughing for days and weeks.
sentences.translation: 这可以把你从要命的咳嗽中拯救出来，避免咳嗽几天或几周后出现疝气。
